  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

results.short_description:
Hollow Knight: Silksong is an indie, action, adventure and platformer game developed by Team Cherry. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG. 
You can play Hollow Knight: Silksong on PC, Linux, macOS and Nintendo Switch. The game is sold via GOG and Steam.

results.short_description:
WarriOrb: Prologue is an indie, action, adventure and RPG game developed by Not Yet. It came out on 10-12-2019. It was published by Maple Whispering Limited. 
You can play WarriOrb: Prologue on Linux and PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.

results.name: Dead Cells

requirements_en.minimum: iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad Air Cellular, iPad Mini Retina, iPad Mini Retina Cellular, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air 2, iPad Air 2 Cellular, iPad Mini 3, iPad Mini 3 Cellular, iPod Touch Sixth Gen, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPad Mini 4, iPad Mini 4 Cellular, iPad Pro, iPad Pro Cellular, iPad Pro 9.7, iPad Pro 9.7 Cellular, iPhone SE, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPad 6 1 1, iPad 6 1 2, iPad 7 1, iPad 7 2, iPad 7 3, iPad 7 4, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 7 5, iPad 7 6, iPhone X S, iPhone X S Max, iPhone X R, iPad 8 1 2, iPad 8 3 4, iPad 8 5 6, iPad 8 7 8, iPad Mini 5, iPad Mini 5 Cellular, iPad Air 3, iPad Air 3 Cellular, iPod Touch Seventh Gen

Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
Storage: 500 MB available space

results.short_description:
Dead Cells is an indie, action, RPG and platformer game developed by Motion Twin, Playdigious and Plug In Digital. It came out on 07-08-2018. Playdigious published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Dead Cells has a score of 88. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. 
Dead Cells is available on iOS, PC, Nintendo Switch and Xbox One. The game is sold via App Store, itch.io, Xbox Store and PlayStation Store.

results.short_description:
Slain: Back from Hell is an indie action-platformer game developed by Andrew Gilmour, Digerati Distribution and Stage Clear Studios. It was originally released in 2016. Digerati published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Slain: Back from Hell has a score of 74. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
You can play Slain: Back from Hell on Linux, PC, macOS and Xbox One. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, Nintendo eShop, GOG and Steam.

results.short_description:
Outland is an indie, action, adventure and platformer game developed by Housemarque and Ubisoft. It came out on 26-04-2011. Housemarque published the game. Outland has a Metascore of 83, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". 
Outland is available on Linux, PC, macOS and Xbox 360. The game is sold via Xbox 360 Store, Steam and PlayStation Store. 
It was scored by Ari Pulkkinen.

results.short_description:
Mark of the Ninja is an indie action-platformer game developed by Klei Entertainment. It was originally released in 2012. Microsoft Studios published the game. Mark of the Ninja has a Metascore of 91, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
Mark of the Ninja is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Nintendo Switch. The game is sold via Xbox 360 Store, GOG and Steam. 
Alicia Savin and Jamie Cheng produced the game. It was directed by Jeff Agala. It was scored by Jason Garner and Vince de Vera.

results.short_description:
Pinstripe is an indie, adventure, puzzle and platformer game developed by Thomas Brush, Atmos Games and Armor Games Inc.. It was originally released in 2017. Serenity Forge published the game. Pinstripe has a Metascore of 70, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. 
You can play Pinstripe on Linux, PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Xbox Store and GOG. 
It was produced by Dan McNeely, Meteb S. Alsahli, Tom Fulp and Vitas Varnas. Thomas Brush scored the game.

results.short_description:
A Story About My Uncle is an indie, adventure, arcade and platformer game developed by Gone North Games. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Coffee Stain Studios. A Story About My Uncle has a Metascore of 73, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". 
A Story About My Uncle is available on Linux, macOS and PC. You can purchase the game on GOG and Steam.

Valley is an indie action-adventure game developed by Blue Isle Studios. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Blue Isle Studios. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. 
You can play Valley on Linux, PC, macOS and Nintendo Switch. You can purchase the game on Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Steam and Xbox Store. 
It was scored by Aakaash Rao and Selcuk Bor.

Creepy Road is an indie action-adventure game developed by Groovy Milk and GROOVY MILK Ltd. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by GrabTheGames. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh". 
Creepy Road is available on macOS, PC, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, Nintendo eShop, Steam and Xbox Store.

seo_text: Are you searching for games like Hollow Knight? Look no further! Here's a list of games similar to Hollow Knight either in the gameplay or in the visual style. If you like Hollow Knight, be sure to check some of these games as well.
